TextView.android:text: So you wanna run track, huh?

The purpose of track is mad simple. Run. Win. There are many different races to choose from, from shorter distancese like the 100m and the 200 m, to longer distances ,like the mile and 2 mile. There are also events that don't include running, like throwing and jumping. Track is less focused on team points, but more on getting athletes to place(1st, 2nd, or 3rd)

Practices will start of fine, with a lot of sprints, and some hellish long distance sets, but they get even worse when shin splints hit. luckily you can avoid running for a bit while they heal by throwing, which either throws (duh) or dies weight room workouts, which should be fine for your legs as long as you dont run.
